summary: WHILE DRIVING MY 2001 JEEP CHEROKEE I HAD SMALL OBJECTS FALL OFF MY CENTER ARM REST AND HIT MY GEN 3 SEAT BELT LATCH CAUSING IT TO OPEN.  THIS HAS HAPPENED TWICE.  I HAVE NOTICED THAT JEEP HAS UPGRADED TO THE GEN 4 LATCH.  WHY HASN'T THERE BEEN A RECALL ON THIS ISSUE?  EVERY DAY SEEMS TO BRING A NEW STORY OF ANOTHER FATAL ACCIDENT INVOLVING A DAIMLER CHRYSLER PRODUCT WITH A FAULTY SEAT BELT LATCH. *JB
